content.value:
The staff at Graffiti Hostel is available 24/7. Our guests can also make use of the shared kitchen. You can ask us to order something to eat and then accompany it with a drink anytime at the bar. The hostel also offers board games, a beautiful library/bathtub hybrid, a info/tour point and, possibly, the friendliest staff in Colombia.

The Gold Museum is 10 minutes walk away from Graffiti Hostel Bogota, wile Monserrate funicular station is 20 minutes away. From el Dorado International Airport, depending on traffic, a taxi drive should take 30 minutes to the house.

Located in 'La Candelaria', Bogota's Old Town, Graffiti Hostel offers rooms with comfortable beds & free WiFi throughout the property. City center's Bolivar Square is only 500 m away.

description.description: Graffiti Hostel offers simple and comfortable private rooms and dormitory rooms. All the 3 bathrooms (one per floor), although shared, offer privacy and are well equipped. Our comfortable common spaces & great WiFi makes it easy to chill, work or meet new fellow travelers.
